item.title: A guide to moonmath manual from a beginners perspective
item.description:
Moonmath Manual

Moonmath manual is a holy grail for getting an idea (yes an idea) about what is happening under the hood for zksnark’s. In this blog I will talk about how to read the manual as a beginner (as I am one myself)
